thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 4 of 1703
thread.title: Eileen

author: Eileen
title: Eileen
text: FlightHub made the search for flights so easy and it is so greatly appreciated that you can toggle the currency to get the actual cost of travel. But, don't wait too long contemplating an itinerary because the price of a flight changes real-time on you. Altogether, the whole process was a quick and easy experience and will not hesitate to use FlightHub for other future travels. THANKS!
